ygData.subject: wake up!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree that the list has died, but anyways I got a question for all you enchanters out there... I am halfway into 28, would have hit 29 but I am cautious and
ygData.messageBody:
I agree that the list has died, but anyways I got a question for all you
enchanters out there...
I am halfway into 28, would have hit 29 but I am cautious and I like to play
around (all guards except highpass hate my 24 illusions... hehe).... How
often do people ask you for clarity? and how hard would it be to get a group
after achieving 29? and last.... do you recommend going /anon or /role?
Thanks in advance...

--
Fabno Licious, 28th Erudite Enchanter, EMarr
